# isDragging

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates whether the receiver is being dragged.

## Declaration

```swift
var isDragging: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver is being dragged, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

## Drawing and event handling

- **draw(_:)**: Draws the receiver’s image that appears in the supplied rectangle.
- **trackMouse(with:adding:)**: Handles user manipulation of the receiver in its ruler view.
